quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.author: Stephen Hawking
quotes.quote: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet.

quotes.author: Marie Curie
quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

quotes.author: Carl Sagan
quotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

quotes.author: Richard Feynman
quotes.quote: Nature uses only the longest threads to weave her patterns, so that each small piece of her fabric reveals the organization of the entire tapestry.
